name: Nothing Personnel: Isekai, but make it Grim Dark, but Make it Parody
name_original: Nothing Personnel: Isekai, but make it Grim Dark, but Make it Parody
description:
NOTHING PERSONNEL, KID

I'm not writing actual advertising copy on this description. I've been reading a lot of terrible power-fantasy isekai recently and I feel like my brain is turning into mush. They're so bad and I really love the idea of an Edgelord Apocalypse where the government tries to replicate the completely unremarkable people who were iskeai'd in these stories and then they are promptly thrown in front of a truck.

Do you want to sit around and play a game that is very, very specific? Do you want to dunk on Webtoons and Manga that don't have an original bone in their body? Then give me $1 or more and you and your group of friends can do exactly that.
